name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot that belongs to the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and classic buttons, Volt stands out from the crowd. Its arms and legs are designed with a unique 'hand down' feature, allowing it to assist in precision tasks. The screen of Volt displays a mesmerizing game of snake, providing entertainment and functionality. To top it all off, Volt wears a sleek helmet as an addon, enhancing its capabilities and protecting it from potential hazards.
